alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:22AM EDT until June 15 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... Northern Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1021 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pridgen to near Enigma, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Douglas, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose and West Green. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
